title: Modern Style Fonts ID help
content:
Hi guys

Need help id'ing a couple of fonts on the posters attached.  
I really like the block display type font that says 'GOT GAME' if anyone has an idea?  
Or if you know any of the others that would be great also.  
Thanks for your help. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [723916976a98c12760532eea3a690048.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051146/http:/typophile.com/files/723916976a98c12760532eea3a690048.jpg) | 199.44 KB |
author: realmadyid

comments.content:
GOT GAME/BROOKLYN/SERVICE/BRONX: [Pulp Fiction](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051146/http:/www.dafont.com/pulp-fiction-m54.font) M54.  
STATEN ISLAND SLAMS/SHOW YOUR: [Face Off](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051146/http:/www.dafont.com/face-off-m54.font) M54  
Manhattan/Queens/Love/The: [Jane Austen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051146/http:/www.dafont.com/jane-austen.font) by Pia Frauss

"GOT GAME" is **[Pulp Fiction M54](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051146/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Pulp%20Fiction%20M54%20-%20Regular&fid=c23a5d40aa93310ba6d7796caf2dd38f&fsize=60&text=GOT%20GAME&fit=1)** by Mohammed Rahman [2009, Free for personal use]

PS: Too late :)
